title: Stocks in the news: HCL Tech, ICICI Sec, Tata Elxsi, Infy, Angel One and Nestle - Economic Times
content: Stocks in the news: HCL Tech, ICICI Sec, Tata Elxsi, Infy, Angel One and Nestle  Economic Times
description: HCL Tech, Nestle, ICICI Lombard GIC, L&T Technology Services, Tata Communications, Crisil, Cyient, Rallis India and Sasken Technologies are some of the companies that will announce their March quarter results today.
